title: This will act as proof
body:
My account is currently not in my possession.
See for reference here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/wshfKPGH-someone-else-keeps-logging-into-my-account?comment=0000
and here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/HmqPIx8G-my-account-was-just-stolen-i-need-help-now?comment=0000

I currently do not have control of my account.
I read on reddit that people have had their accounts hacked and then banned because of actions made by the hacker on that persons account,

As you can see here:
https://i.gyazo.com/85c94bc9cff5ce5245e3ee28b499ecf7.png
Whoever hacked my account also played a ranked game on it and AFK'd. Which is the reason I am making this thread.
If for some reason the hacker continues this behavior and it results in my account getting banned I don't want to end up like the many people on reddit who had their accounts hacked and then banned as a result of the hacker and then not able to have it reinstated.

So let this thread act as proof right now that I am not the one on my account.
Please upvote and do whatever you can to get this noticed

(They also changed my icon, those jerks...)

Edit: I already Sent in a ticket. This is my proof in case riot does not unban my account if by chance the hacker on my account gets it banned while on my account.

Update: 01/04/2016
https://i.gyazo.com/0c7ebbeb9f009e1cdacc8483fbcc01db.png
They're currently playing a normal game as heimer

Update: 01/04/2016
Screen shots from my friend talking to the person on my account
https://i.gyazo.com/f2085c98b8ea8ab7af04659a70fb3190.png
https://i.gyazo.com/d5c34c1bd4e5195f71640286fb3513cc.png

Another update:
https://i.gyazo.com/5319ba5531cb27e205880c9a1efef1d3.png

Final update: 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/InEoVjsw-thank-you-riot-so-much

replies.body: FREE CLEARLY A VIRGIN 2K16 {{champion:104}} ALSO FREE GRAVES

They had to have gotten your info some how. This seems like a case of a keylogger, so that must mean you downloaded something you wasn't suppose to. Hopefully everything works out for you. Just try and keep changing passwords, and hopefully support can contact you soon.
This. OP needs to do a thorough scan of his system. Root out any unwanted software, the use an AV to find rootkits.

> [{quoted}](name=TwinkiePro,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-01-04T10:10:36.542+0000)
>
> This. OP needs to do a thorough scan of his system. Root out any unwanted software, the use an AV to find rootkits.

I'm very bad at computers. What is an AV?

Malwarebytes works wonders.

If that doesn't get the shit out then follow up with superantispyware and spybot. As a last resort use hijack this

You should always have an antivirus running on your computer. Windows 10 should come with one built in, but Avast and AVG make great free ones

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2016-01-04T17:04:00.421+0000)
>
> Malwarebytes works wonders.
> 
> If that doesn't get the shit out then follow up with superantispyware and spybot. As a last resort use hijack this
> 
> You should always have an antivirus running on your computer. Windows 10 should come with one built in, but Avast and AVG make great free ones

AVG has become bloated, IME. Slows down my computer almost as much as McAfee.
It's far from perfect but it is still top tier of the free antivirus programs.

> [{quoted}](name=Stillname,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000200000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-05T18:54:36.223+0000)
>
> It's far from perfect but it is still top tier of the free

Good to know. I actually don't run Antivirus anymore because I just don't download anything. Windows is pretty much only for league/civ/Dota at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=clearly a virgin,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-01-04T10:19:20.932+0000)
>
> I'm very bad at computers. What is an AV?

Antivirus. Use whatever you feel comfortable and as a second hand scanner incase you want to be sure you got shit done, use HitmanPro.
AV means AntiVirus. Like jelly mac said, Malwarebytes is a really good shot.

> [{quoted}](name=Sarutobi,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-04T09:08:36.659+0000)
>
> They had to have gotten your info some how. This seems like a case of a keylogger, so that must mean you downloaded something you wasn't suppose to. Hopefully everything works out for you. Just try and keep changing passwords, and hopefully support can contact you soon.

I had the same issue with a keylogger, lucky they didn't play any games,
I'd recommend malwarebytes OP.
ok posting here does nothing, if you really think someone hacked you send a support titkiet with this image, and update you password to a something more secure

> [{quoted}](name=LaoBushido,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-04T09:06:27.547+0000)
>
> ok posting here does nothing, if you really think someone hacked you send a support titkiet with this image, and update you password to a something more secure

Sorry about that. I should've put in the OP that I already sent in a ticket. 
The reason I'm making this thread is because there are cases where hackers get people banned while on someone else's account and riot does not recover the banned account.
Then ask for a temporary ban until you've made sure there's nothing on your PC saving your password and sending it around, then contact support again to get your account back.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-04T11:13:29.574+0000)
>
> Then ask for a temporary ban until you've made sure there's nothing on your PC saving your password and sending it around, then contact support again to get your account back.

Are temporary bans an actual thing? I'd rather them disable my account than have someone fiddle with it while I'm trying to get it back.

I'm just going to ramble and get everything out of my head about this situation because it's driving me crazy that we're just sitting around, doing nothing.

First and foremost, I am a legitimate friend of clearly a virgin as well as a few other people that have posted in this thread. I can assure you that I'm not some kind of fake, random, or hacked account that is just speaking against my will or anything. I have been playing with clearly a virgin since 2014 and I can guarantee any one of you guys that he isn't bullshitting any of you. There's also a couple of friends that are posting in this thread too just to prove that the actual owner of the account was truly hacked. Why do you think there are so many views, responses, and ups? We care about our friend and hope Riot helps him out. There are other pictures that he didn't post which includes his email being hacked as well as his passwords being changed. **He has no control and would like SOME assistance from any Rioter. ** It's so obvious that it's obviously not the original owner because the account's been logged in from other countries and have poor english. The origin of his account anyways is in one location and one location only in the US which is literally in the middle of no where. I assume that it can't be THAT hard to identify that the person that created this thread is the rightful owner. The last thing I want for him is to lose his account after years worth of money and getting good at the game (actually giving a f*** about having league in our daily lives).

* _SO NO, he is not the hacker that created this thread.  It is the actual owner and I'm here as a backer to make it clear as day for some of you guys that don't read the entire OP. _
* _BONUS FOR SOME OF YOU WHO OBVIOUSLY DIDN'T READ THE OP IN ITS ENTIRETY, HE DID SUBMIT A TICKET. TWICE._
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

We as forum readers... will save you!

Probably...

maybe
Just a clarification: This is evidence of, not proof of.
Doesn't evidence *prove* stuff though?

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Glitterfart,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2016-01-05T06:17:00.724+0000)
>
> Doesn't evidence *prove* stuff though?

Evidence is one part of proving something, but it takes a lot of evidence from a lot of different variables to prove something
:( yikes
substance bumping
free cav :(
hi its due im bump
So this is proof that you are clearly a virgin? ... i can see that{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I AM SO ****ING SERIOUS!!! HE PAID OVER $745 DOLLARS FOR THIS ****TY WEBSITE!!! WHY HE PAID SO MUCH?!! IT'S BECAUSE IT'S THE ONLY WAY HE CAN BE POPULAR ON LEAGUE OF LEGENDS!! DO YOU PEOPLE ****ING THINK PEOPLE WILL TALK TO ME IF I WAS SKINNED LIKE A ****ING NOOB!!! DON'T GIVE ME BULL***!!! NOBODY WILL ****ING TALK TO ME!!! LEAGUE OF LEGENDS YOU BETTER GIVE HIM HIS ****ING BACK OR WILL ****ING SUE YOUR ASSES FOR BEING A GOLD DIGGER WEBSITE!!!
Update: Still no response from Riot. No recent activity on my account. If a rioter could at least inform me if my ticket is being looked at? Give me some sort of peace of mind?
Uhhh, change your password?

> reddit
> clearly a virgin
So uh..do you want US to free your account or something? Seriously, people attend to Riot Support with these, there's nothing the community can do about it.
is there any way you could change your password via email or something ?

Posting in boards doesn't really help but we can tell you where to go. Riot support handles all of that. My account too, was recently hacked. I immediately changed my password as soon as I figured out what was going on and then contacted Riot, who said that changing the password should be the only step I needed, but to come back to them if it continued happening. Thankfully it did not, but they were very fast and very helpful with it all.

> [{quoted}](name=Deoxite,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2016-01-05T13:01:15.681+0000)
>
> Posting in boards doesn't really help but we can tell you where to go. Riot support handles all of that. My account too, was recently hacked. I immediately changed my password as soon as I figured out what was going on and then contacted Riot, who said that changing the password should be the only step I needed, but to come back to them if it continued happening. Thankfully it did not, but they were very fast and very helpful with it all.

I'm mainly just posting this here in case the hacker tries to get my account banned. I've gone through all the steps and now I'm just waiting on riot to get back to me. I know it's just been a day but I've barely slept so it feels like forever when waiting to hear from them.
I'm glad you got your account back.

> [{quoted}](name=clearly a virgin,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=00180000,timestamp=2016-01-05T13:13:54.237+0000)
>
> I'm mainly just posting this here in case the hacker tries to get my account banned. I've gone through all the steps and now I'm just waiting on riot to get back to me. I know it's just been a day but I've barely slept so it feels like forever when waiting to hear from them.
> I'm glad you got your account back.

Thank you! I'm glad that you've done everything you can, the Riot support team was very helpful and kind to me throughout the whole process, I hope you get the same experience and I hope the hacker didn't screw up your account too badly {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

This may be of interest to you:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JX3Twfq6-how-to-protect-your-account

why many people hacked recently?
is league not safe anymore?
I honestly don't know how to help. All I can say is... that just sucks. Hope Riot helps you soon
Update. New information has been added to the OP.

RIOT DOESN'T DO ANYTHING WHEN YOUR ACCOUNT IS HACKED I KNOW THIS FROM EXPERIENCE BACK IN 2014 I GOT HACKED WHEN VEL'KOZ WAS RELEASED AND I SENT A SUPPORT TICKET AND THEY DIDN'T DO ANYTHING. HECK I HAD TO GET A FRIEND TO SEND ME THE SUSPECTED EMAIL OF THE HACKER AND ALSO CRACKED THE PASSWORD. so if you want to get your account back try looking into hacking.

Saying "I got hacked" before going AFK won't prevent punishment. Otherwise people could just post "I got hacked" and then go AFK. 

Just change your password.
It's happening to multiple people, meaning something was spread out. I'd believe this is happening because it's happened to me too (And it sucks.)

> [{quoted}](name=Jari,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-01-04T19:15:01.843+0000)
>
> It's happening to multiple people, meaning something was spread out. I'd believe this is happening because it's happened to me too (And it sucks.)

So it's not just me? I thought I was being targeted or that it was a keylogger but after doing as many scans as possible I didn't find any malicious software in my computer. My best guess is that they cracked my password since I use it for everything.
I wasn't hit by this. It was more around season 1 for me. I'm just letting him know you aren't lying about it.
How is this proof for anything?

> [{quoted}](name=ZGM Dazzling,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9iEaGRWw,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-01-04T17:14:07.672+0000)
>
> How is this proof for anything?

My account was logged in from another computer before I was in that ranked game as you can see from the screen shot and time of my other thread, link to that thread is in the OP.
RIP.
Then send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) there and include that photo or any others that can help prove it.

learn to make a support ticket?
everytime i see this kind of shit on the boards i instinctively think you are bullshitting. 
You want community support to make riot out to be the bad guy when shit hits the fan.
